mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.selectGrHeaderInfo] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , A.PO_NO , B.CDC , B.MEM_ACC_ID , CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(1) FROM HMC0009M WHERE PO_NO = A.PO_NO AND HMC_DELVRY_NO = A.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND GR_YN = 'N') = 1 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_NEW_YN , (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_MASTER_ID = '432' AND DISAB = '0' AND CODE_ID = A.DELVRY_STATUS) AS DELVRY_STATUS_CD FROM HMC0007M A , HMC0004M B WHERE A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = #{hmcDelvryNo}
mapper.insert: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.insertDeliveryGrDetailList] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO HMC0010D ( HMC_GR_NO , HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO , HMC_DELVRY_NO , HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , STOCK_ID , STOCK_CODE , RCIPT_QTY , QC_FAIL_QTY , USE_YN , CRT_DT , CRT_USER_ID , UPD_DT , UPD_USER_ID ) SELECT #{hmcGrNo} AS HMC_GR_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO), 0) AS HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO FROM HMC0010D WHERE HMC_GR_NO = #{hmcGrNo}) + ROWNUM AS HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO , HMC_DELVRY_NO AS HMC_DELVRY_NO , HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO AS HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , PO_NO , PO_DTL_NO , STOCK_ID , STOCK_CODE , 0 AS RCIPT_QTY , 0 AS QC_FAIL_QTY , 'Y' AS USE_YN , SYSDATE AS CRT_DT , #{crtUserId} AS CRT_USER_ID , SYSDATE AS UPD_DT , #{updUserId} AS UPD_USER_ID FROM HMC0008D WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND HMC_DELVRY_NO = #{hmcDelvryNo}

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.insertDeliveryGrDetail] - KR JIN */ INSERT INTO HMC0010D ( HMC_GR_NO --HomeCare GR Number , HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO --HomeCare GR Detail Number , HMC_DELVRY_NO --Delivery Number , HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO --Delivery Detail Number , PO_NO --PO No , PO_DTL_NO --Po Detail No , STOCK_ID --Material , STOCK_CODE --Material Code , RCIPT_QTY --Quantity Received , QC_FAIL_QTY --Qc Fail Quantity , USE_YN --USE_YN , CRT_DT --Create Date , CRT_USER_ID --Create User Id , UPD_DT --Update Date , UPD_USER_ID --Update User Id
)VALUES( #{hmcGrNo} --HomeCare GR Number , (SELECT NVL(MAX(HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO), 0)+1 AS HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO FROM HMC0010D WHERE HMC_GR_NO = #{hmcGrNo}) , #{hmcDelvryNo} --Delivery Number , #{hmcDelvryNoDtlNo} --Delivery Detail Number , #{poNo} --PO No , #{poDtlNo} --Po Detail No , #{stockId} --Material , #{stockCode} --Material Code , #{rciptQty} --Quantity Received , #{qcFailQty} --Qc Fail Quantity , 'Y' , SYSDATE , #{crtUserId} --Create User Id , SYSDATE , #{updUserId} --Update User Id )
mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.selectGrDifferenceCnt] - KR JIN */ SELECT SUM(Z.DIFF_QTY) AS DIFF_QTY FROM ( SELECT A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , NVL(A.DELVRY_QTY, 0) AS DELVRY_QTY , NVL(B.GR_QTY, 0) AS GR_QTY , NVL(A.DELVRY_QTY, 0) - NVL(B.GR_QTY, 0) AS DIFF_QTY FROM HMC0008D A , ( SELECT A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , A.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO , B.STOCK_ID , B.STOCK_CODE , SUM(rcipt_qty) + SUM(qc_fail_qty) AS GR_QTY FROM HMC0009M A , HMC0010D B WHERE A.HMC_GR_NO = B.HMC_GR_NO AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = #{hmcDelvryNo} GROUP BY A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , A.PO_NO , B.PO_DTL_NO , B.STOCK_ID , B.STOCK_CODE ) B WHERE A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO (+) AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO (+) AND A.PO_DTL_NO = B.PO_DTL_NO (+) AND A.STOCK_ID = B.STOCK_ID (+) AND A.STOCK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE (+) AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = #{hmcDelvryNo} ) Z

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.selectLocationSerialChk] - KR JIN */ SELECT CASE WHEN '61' = #{stkTypeId} AND SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN SERIAL_PD_CHK WHEN '62' = #{stkTypeId} AND SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN SERIAL_FT_CHK WHEN '63' = #{stkTypeId} AND SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN = 'Y' THEN SERIAL_PT_CHK ELSE 'N' END AS SERIAL_CHK FROM ( SELECT NVL(SERIAL_PD_CHK, 'N') AS SERIAL_PD_CHK -- PRODUCT 61(15) , NVL(SERIAL_FT_CHK, 'N') AS SERIAL_FT_CHK -- FILTER 62(15) , NVL(SERIAL_PT_CHK, 'N') AS SERIAL_PT_CHK -- PARTS 63(15) , NVL(SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN, 'N') AS SERIAL_REQUIRE_CHK_YN FROM SYS0028M WHERE WH_LOC_ID = #{cdc} )

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.homecare.po.impl.HcDeliveryGrMapper.selectGrDetailList] - KR JIN */ SELECT A.HMC_GR_NO , A.HMC_GR_NO_DTL_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO , A.HMC_DELVRY_NO_DTL_NO , A.PO_NO , A.PO_DTL_NO , B.CDC , A.STOCK_ID , A.STOCK_CODE , A.RCIPT_QTY , A.QC_FAIL_QTY , DECODE(C.SERIAL_CHK, 'Y', 'Y', 'N') AS SERIAL_CHK , C.STK_TYPE_ID FROM HMC0010D A , HMC0009M B , SYS0026M C WHERE A.HMC_GR_NO = B.HMC_GR_NO AND A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.HMC_DELVRY_NO = B.HMC_DELVRY_NO AND A.STOCK_ID = C.STK_ID AND A.STOCK_CODE = C.STK_CODE AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.HMC_GR_NO = #{hmcGrNo}
